description: This course involves practice and game observation and a practicum in coaching a sport. Students are involved in practice planning and drill work, game preparation, and administration, as well as game rules and coaching strategies. This course applies toward the coaching sequence only. Prerequisite: Physical Education 238 and permission of instructor.
name: Coaching Practicum
prerequisites: Physical Education 238 and permission of instructor.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Physical Education 238 and permission of instructor.
